Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.home

Class StandardHomeBuilder

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.home.StandardHomeBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
HomeBuilder
public final class StandardHomeBuilder extends Object implements HomeBuilder
Class is an implementation of the HomeBuilder interface. It provides methods for creating and configuring a home with various floors, rooms, and inhabitants. This class follows the Singleton pattern and offers a single instance.
